opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 2nd day of July, 2014, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal and Motion for Leave to File Reply in Support of Petition for Allowance of Appeal are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
